segments.text: I notice the water overflowing and running all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying dishes like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the puddle at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is climbing on that stool, and it looks like it’s going to tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, not even looking at the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be really upset when she finally sees the mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside is a disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone stops the water before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if the children will get in trouble for this.
segments.speaker: PAR
